quotes.quote: You gotta know when to be lazy. Done correctly, it's an art form that benefits everyone.
I'm not lazy, I'm just very relaxed.
Yesterday I did nothing and today I'm finishing what I did yesterday.
Ambition is a poor excuse for not having sense enough to be lazy.
Any man who reads too much and uses his own brain too little falls into lazy habits of thinking.
Laziness is in tune with transitory time.
Lazy people tend not to take chances, but express themselves by tearing down other's work.
The lazy are always wanting to do something.
Laziness is the enemy of virtue, and the very train of all wickedness.
Deep down I'm a lazy person in a constantly moving body.
Laziness may appear attractive, but work gives satisfaction.
Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired.
People are not lazy. They simply have impotent goals - that is, goals that do not inspire them.
Although laziness is common and a natural part of life, it has the potential to completely consume us.
Working hard is great, being lazy sometimes is great, but failed potential is the worst.
Laziness is the first big step towards efficiency.
The trouble with the world is that laziness is seldom curable and never fatal.
I'm always busy, but I'm lazy as well.
Lazy people live lonely lives.
The flesh, or human nature, is generally lazy and self-centered.
There are all kinds of stupid people that annoy me but what annoys me most is a lazy argument.
Progress isn't made by early risers. It's made by lazy men trying to find easier ways to do something.
Laziness prevents more crimes than morality.
Let us be lazy in everything, except in loving and drinking, except in being lazy.
I love my job only when I'm on vacation.
I do believe sometimes discipline is very important. I'm not just lying around like a lazy cow all the time.
While laziness comes in many forms, it usually has one direct effect. And that's that nothing gets accomplished.
Don't be too lazy. Don't get too desperate.
There are no ugly women, only lazy ones.
I'm afraid of only two things: being lazy and being cowardly.
